propDescriptions.applyFilterChanges:
Callback called when the operator, column field or value is changed.

Signature:
function(item: GridFilterItem) => void
item: The updated GridFilterItem.
propDescriptions.applyMultiFilterOperatorChanges:
Callback called when the logic operator is changed.

Signature:
function(operator: GridLinkOperator) => void
operator: The new logic operator.
propDescriptions.columnInputProps: Props passed to the column input component.
propDescriptions.columnsSort: Changes how the options in the columns selector should be ordered. If not specified, the order is derived from the columns prop.
propDescriptions.deleteFilter:
Callback called when the delete button is clicked.

Signature:
function(item: GridFilterItem) => void
item: The deleted GridFilterItem.
propDescriptions.deleteIconProps: Props passed to the delete icon.
propDescriptions.disableMultiFilterOperator: If true, disables the logic operator field but still renders it.
propDescriptions.focusElementRef: A ref allowing to set imperative focus. It can be passed to the el
propDescriptions.hasMultipleFilters: If true, the logic operator field is rendered. The field will be invisible if showMultiFilterOperators is also true.
propDescriptions.linkOperatorInputProps: Props passed to the logic operator input component.
propDescriptions.operatorInputProps: Props passed to the operator input component.
propDescriptions.showMultiFilterOperators: If true, the logic operator field is visible.
propDescriptions.valueInputProps: Props passed to the value input component.
